mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_catalogue_management ( class_code, class_level, class_name, parent_class_code, note, is_deleted, creator, create_time, last_modified_by, modified_time, version ) values ( #{classCode}, #{classLevel}, #{className}, #{parentClassCode}, #{note}, 0, #{creator}, now(), #{modifiedBy}, now(), 0 )
mapper.update: update t_sys_catalogue_management set is_deleted = 1, last_modified_by = #{userId}, modified_time = now(), version = version + 1 where class_Code = #{classId} or parent_class_code = #{classId}

update t_sys_catalogue_management set
class_name = #{className},
note = #{note},
last_modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_time = now(), version = version + 1 where is_deleted = 0 and class_code = #{classCode} and version = #{version}
mapper.select: select class_name className, note note from t_sys_catalogue_management where is_deleted = 0 and class_code = #{classCode}

select c1.class_code as firClassCode, c1.class_level as firClassLevel, c1.class_name firClassName, c1.version as version1, c2.class_code as secClassCode, c2.class_name as secClassName, c2.parent_class_code as parentClassCode, c2.class_level as secClassLevel, c2.version as version2 from t_sys_catalogue_management as c1 join t_sys_catalogue_management as c2 on c1.class_code = c2.parent_class_code where c1.is_deleted = 0 and c2.is_deleted = 0 and c1.class_level = 1
